Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

TBl1.Tooltip:
Basic Structure, used to receive collected resources. Can lift off.

Allow:
- SCV
TBl1.Name: Build Command Center

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provide upgrades for Raynor and defense buildings.

Allow:
-Missile Turrets
- Sentry Turrets
TBl1.Name: Build Engineering Bay

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Air-Defense Structure.

Can attack the air.
Detection unit
TBl1.Name: Build Missile Turret

TBl1.Tooltip: A lad always profess himself to be a genius scientist. Probably only Stetmann would do that. Nevertheless, after breathed Terrazine, he is still addicted to various fields of scientific research. You can upgrades your equipment through Stetmann's Laboratory.
TBl1.Name: Build Stetmann's Laboratory

TBl1.Tooltip: The Ammunition Depot can give Raynor ammunition to replenish the weapons it returns to the armory. You can use resources to purchase the corresponding equipment skill use times for Raynor in this building.
TBl1.Name: Build Ammunition Depot

TBl1.Tooltip: Graven Hill, scarred, famous mercenary recruiter with links to the black market. You can always sign a deadly contract in this building. Spend some money to hire Hill's mercenaries to fight for you for a while.
TBl1.Name: Build Mercenary Compound

TBl1.Tooltip:
Automated defense turret.

Can attack the ground and air.

Detection unit
TBl1.Name: Build Sentry Turret

TBl1.Tooltip: Being the Chief Engineer of Raiders, Swann and his "Old Friends" are enthusiastic about collecting blueprints and designing various kinds of innovative equipment and weapons for Raynor. Now, you can unlock and switch these equipment and weapons through Swann's Armory.
TBl1.Name: Build Swann's Armory
